description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

最早是1952年的单曲，由三位词曲作者合作而成，分别是Pee Wee King, Redd Stewart和Chilton Price。
Sue Thompson是第一位演唱这首歌的歌手。后来翻唱过的有Carla Bruni,Bob Dylan,Jason Wade,Michael Buble,Rick Astley,Dean Martin,Mickey Katz,The Platters等。其中Jason Wade的版本成为《怪物史莱克》中的经典插曲，Bob Dylan的版本成为《天生杀人狂》中的插曲。
Jason Michael Wade，1980年7月5日生于美国加洲Camarillo，Lifehouse的主唱、作曲、吉他手。2001年与Braeden Wade结婚。

讲解：

模唱部分：

See the pyramids along the Nile
Watch the sun rise from the tropic isle
Just remember darling all the while
You belong to me

See the market place in old Algiers
Send me photographs and souvenirs
Just remember when a dream appears
You belong to me

And I'll be so alone without you
Maybe you'll be lonesome too

Fly the ocean in a silver plane
See the jungle when it's wet with rain
Just remember till you're home again
You belong to me

Oh I'll be so alone without you
Maybe you'll be lonesome too
Fly the ocean in a silver plane

See the jungle when it's wet with rain
Just remember till you're home again
You belong to me

模唱：

想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：You belong to me

description:
We will start with some football because Manchester United's new signing Anthony Martial says he's not worried about his record 55-million-dollar price tag. The striker has become the world's most expensive teenager as he signed from Monaco on transfer deadline day. His fee could rise to over $80 million if he wins football's biggest award with United.

"I don't know if I'm worth €80 million. I'm not in charge of the amount. I'm going there for sporting reasons. The amount is for the two clubs to decide. I'm not putting myself under any particular pressure apart from wanting to show what I'm capable of doing on the field. There are lots of young players who've already gone to big clubs and some have been successful others less so. It's a challenge for me, but I think I'm ready for it."
